document_data.name: Darva
document_data.mainbody: '''Darva''' was a member of the ruling triumvirate in [[Fireshear]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]], Darva was the leader of the local branch of the [[Silver Triangle]], a merchant company based in [[Neverwinter]]. Triumvirate members served until they died or resigned.

Darva was one of the leaders of the town when it was attacked by a marauding party of twenty [[frost giant]]s, who arrived in a frost giant [[greatship]].
document_data.Personality: Along with the other members of the ruling triumvirate, Darva was known to accept bribes, exchanging ore and coin for more and better supplies, whose distribution they controlled.
